meaningMnemonic: <kanji>Respect</kanji> <kanji>language</kanji> is what you speak to someone you respect and want to elevate. You can do this using this type of Japanese, which is known as <vocabulary>honorific</vocabulary> language.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
